text: Dughiar avɨribar Hadateser faragha, Toin apanim gami. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Devit Hadateserɨn mɨsoghezir bizim bagha, Atrivim Toi bar akonge. Kamaghɨn Toi, uan otarim Hadoram, an ziar igharazim Joram, Devit bagha anemada. Egha a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ mangɨ nan dughiar aghuim a danɨngigh. Egh kamaghɨn a mɨkɨm suam, Kɨ orazi, nɨ Hadateser abɨragha gɨfa. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ bizir nɨ amizir kam bagha bar akonge.” Ezɨ Hadoram Devit bagha ghua bizir aghuir me gol ko silva ko brasɨn ingariziba a ganɨdi.
